name: An aqueous mixture containing peroxyacetic acid
hydrogen peroxide
acetic acid
1-diphosphonic acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture containing peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), and 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4).
